title: Surrender time should be 15 minutes.
body: I should not be forced to play with incompetent players for twenty minutes.

replies.body: agree, although sometimes it is just a bad game

> [{quoted}](name=Robo23,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5vyLU4h7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-01T12:05:08.266+0000)
>
> agree, although sometimes it is just a bad game

.>Top playing proxy singed against Darius, who is 5/0 before 10 mins.
.>Mid has 37cs at 8 minutes.

http://i.imgur.com/Y1zxe0R.jpg

stfu and deal with it.

Maybe you are the incompetent one?

i would be less hesitant to actually spend money on the game if i knew i wouldnt finally ragequit after not being able to take this shit anymore. but you know whats worse than not surrendering 5 minutes earlier? when none of your shitty hole feeding teammates wants to surrender and then we still end up losing like 5 hours later since the enemy wont hit the base they just go around taking 50 barons and dancing under the nexus turrets
